game_advanced_tutorial_quest_name_lane_t: Destroy All Enemy Turrets in a Lane
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_name_nexus_: Destroy the Turrets Protecting the Enemy Nexus
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_anc:
Defeat the Blue Sentinel
The Blue Sentinel can be found in the west jungle, south of the river. Defeat him to earn extra experience points and gold, as well as a special buff for your champion.
Click to see the Blue Sentinel's location
Reward: 200 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_buy:
Purchase Boots in the Shop
Visit the shop at the summoner platform and purchase a set of boots. You'll find boots in the MOVEMENT section of the shop, as well as on your recommended items list.

Move Speed is important for reducing travel time, catching opponents on the run, and escaping enemies who are chasing you.
Reward: 100 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_dra:
Slay the Dragon
The Dragon lives on the south side of the southern river. Defeat it to earn a powerful buff for your entire team.
Click to see the Dragon's location
Reward: 300 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_fro:
Destroy an Enemy Turret
Follow your minion waves to the first enemy turret in any lane, and destroy it. Wait for the turret to target your minions before you attack it, and be sure to retreat to a safe distance before all of your minions are slain.
Click to see turret location on the minimap
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_inh:
Destroy an Enemy Inhibitor
Attack and destroy the exposed enemy inhibitor to begin spawning super minions in that lane. This will also allow you to attack the turrets guarding the enemy nexus.
Click to see exposed inhibitor locations on the minimap
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_kil:
Slay 5 Enemy Minions
Deal the killing blow to 5 enemy minions. You'll earn bonus gold each time you deal a fatal blow.
Reward: 100 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_lan:
Destroy All Enemy Turrets in a Lane
Support your minion waves to push forward and destroy all enemy turrets in a single lane. Doing so will expose the enemy inhibitor in that lane.
Click to see turret locations on the minimap
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_liz:
Defeat the Red Brambleback
The Red Brambleback can be found in the southeast jungle. Defeat him to earn extra experience points and gold, as well as a special buff for your champion.
Click to see the Red Brambleback's location
Reward: 200 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_mov:
Exit the Base
Move your champion away from the summoner platform to one of the three lanes outside the base walls.
Click to see lane locations on the minimap
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_nex:
Destroy the Enemy Nexus
Attack and destroy the exposed enemy nexus to claim victory! At least one enemy inhibitor must remain destroyed for the nexus to remain vulnerable.
Click to see nexus location on the minimap

Destroy the Turrets Protecting the Enemy Nexus
Support your minion waves to destroy the turrets located in front of the enemy nexus. The nexus will become vulnerable when both turrets are destroyed!
Click to see turret locations on the minimap
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_pri:
Primary Quests
Primary quests are main objectives that your team must complete to win the battle.
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_rec:
Use the Recall Spell
The Recall spell will quickly return your champion to the summoner platform. The platform will restore your health and mana, and you can purhcase new items at the shop while you're there.

Be careful though; damage from enemies will cancel this spell.
Reward: 100 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_sec:
Secondary Quests
Secondary quests are optional, though completing them will improve your chances of victory. You'll also receive bonus gold!
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_sla:
Slay an Enemy Champion
Look for a good opportunity to slay an enemy champion. Remember that nearby enemy minions and turrets will come to the champion's aid when you attack.
Reward: 200 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_sta:
Purchase a Starting Item
Before leaving the summoner platform, click on the item shop and purchase one or more starting items. The first item in the recommended items list is generally a good choice.
Click to see shop location on the minimap
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_vie:
Move Your Mouse Cursor Here
Well done! You can mouse over the quest tracker to view quest details.
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_wol:
Defeat the Murk Wolves
A pack of wolves can be found in the southwestern jungle. Defeat them to earn extra experience points and gold.
Click to see the wolves' location
Reward: 100 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_quest_tooltip_wra:
Defeat the Raptors
A group of raptors can be found in the jungle, just south of the center of the map. Defeat them to earn extra experience points and gold.
Click to see the raptors' location
Reward: 125 gold
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_assist: You earned an assist by helping an ally slay an enemy champion!  Your champion receives a bonus gold reward for earning assists.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_baron: Baron Nashor is the strongest monster on Summoner's Rift, and you will need the help of your allies to defeat him.  Slaying the Baron will grant all alive ally champions a powerful buff and a large gold reward.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_baron_: Fighting Baron Nashor without the help of your allies will likely result in death.  You should return to a lane or explore other areas of the jungle.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_brush: You've stepped into a patch of brush.  While within an area of brush you are invisible to enemies until they too enter the same brush.  Be alert when approaching these areas - enemy champions may be waiting to ambush you!
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_buff_d: These icons indicate helpful or harmful effects, also known as buffs and debuffs, currently affecting your champion.  Place your mouse cursor over an icon to view details.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_chat: Chat from allies and enemies appears in the bottom left of the screen.  You can type to allies by pressing enter, and type to everyone by pressing shift-enter.  You can read old messages by pressing and holding Z.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_danger: Careful, your champion is deep in enemy territory while a number of enemy champions are not visible on the minimap.  Players commonly refer to missing champions as 'MIA'.  Be wary of a potential ambush!
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_death_: While waiting for your champion to respawn, you can click the Death Recap button to learn how you were defeated.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_dragon: Slaying the Dragon results in a permanent buff for all ally champions. The buff grows stronger each time your team defeats the Dragon.

The Dragon is a very strong monster.  Your champion should have full health and mana before attacking it.  The buffs from the Blue Sentinel and Red Brambleback will also make defeating the Dragon much easier.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_first_: Don't forget to spend your first skill point!  The battle has not yet begun, so now is a good time to browse your champion's abilities and decide which one you want first.
Good job!  Tips provide valuable information about many aspects of League of Legends, so be sure to click on the icons when they appear above the minimap.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_front_: While not required, it's often a good idea to destroy the first enemy turret in each of the three lanes before attempting to take down a second turret.  You'll improve your team's control of the battlefield, and earn a good amount of experience points and gold along the way.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_golem_: Defeating the Blue Sentinel grants your champion a temporary buff.  While the buff is active your champion will regenerate mana faster and be able to cast their spells more often.
The Blue Sentinel is a strong adversary.  Be sure to slay his minions first, and don't forget to use your champion's abilities.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_inhibi: A destroyed enemy inhibitor will respawn after several minutes.  When this happens, your team will no longer spawn super minions in that lane.  The enemy nexus is invulnerable while all three inhibitors are active.
Destroying an enemy inhibitor causes your base to begin spawning super minions in that lane.  Super minions are much stronger than normal minions and are quite difficult to kill.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_item_r: You haven't purchased an item yet.  You should return to the summoner platform and buy an item from the shop before leaving the base.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_lane_n: There are top, middle, and bottom lanes on Summoner's Rift.  Summoners often refer to these lanes as 'top', 'mid', and 'bot'.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_last_h: Your champion earns bonus gold when dealing a killing blow to an enemy.  Time your attacks carefully to increase your wealth.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_lizard: Defeating the Red Brambleback grants your champion a temporary buff.  This buff causes your champion's basic attacks to slow enemy Move Speed and deal damage over time.
The Red Brambleback is a worthy foe.  Be sure to slay his minions first, and don't forget to use your champion's abilities.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_low_he: Your champion's health is dangerously low.  You should move to a safe location and use the Recall spell to return to the summoner platform for healing.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_low_mi: Warning!  There are very few ally minions remaining near this enemy turret.  The turret will attack you when there are no minions left, so you should retreat to a safe distance and wait for more ally minions to arrive.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_manale: While most champions in the League use mana to fuel their abilities, many rely on alternative resources.  Garen's abilities are free to cast, though you still must wait for them to ''cool down'' before they can be used again.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_minima: The minimap displays information about the battlefield.  Everything visible to your allies will appear here, so it's important to check the minimap often.

Pinging the minimap is a good way to notify allies about potential dangers and opportunities on the battlefield.  Click this button then click a location on the minimap to ping it.  You can also ping an enemy champion or structure directly to mark them as a target.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_mirror: Most neutral minion camps can be found in two different locations in the jungle.  It is generally safer to attack the camps on your team's side of the battlefield.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_move_w: You can easily guide your champion to distant locations by right clicking the minimap.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_passiv: Each champion has a unique passive ability that works automatically.  Move your mouse over the icon to read a description of your champion's passive ability.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_proxim: Even if your champion does not deal a killing blow, experience points are earned by being near an enemy as they are slain.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_respaw: You have been slain, but don't be discouraged - death is a part of League of Legends.  After a short time your champion will be re-summoned to the battlefield.  The wait time will increase as your champion gains levels.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_scoreb: The scoreboard displays stats and information about each champion on the battlefield.  You can view the scoreboard by pressing and holding the TAB key.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_shop_w: You can spend gold on new items at the shop while waiting to respawn.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_skill_: Don't forget to spend skill points after your champion gains a level.  Increasing the rank of a spell improves its effectiveness.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_spend_: You've earned a lot of gold!  Be sure to purchase new items at the shop the next time you're near the summoner platform.  Don't forget you can use the Recall spell to go there quickly.
You still have a lot of gold to spend.  Don't forget to purchase new items in the shop at the summoner platform to strengthen your champion.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_turret: Warning!  You are approaching an enemy turret with no friendly minions in front of you.  You should wait until friendly minions arrive and allow the turret to attack them before getting closer.

When an enemy turret is destroyed, all ally champions receive bonus gold and experience points.  It also allows your minions to push further into enemy territory, which improves your team's control of the map.
Attacking a champion near an enemy turret will cause that turret to attack you.  Avoid doing this until your champion is strong enough to survive the damage.
game_advanced_tutorial_tip_dialog_ultima: When Ashe reaches level 6, you can unlock her ultimate ability: Enchanted Crystal Arrow.  The arrow can be fired to any location on the map, and will stun and deal damage to the first enemy champion it collides with.

When Garen reaches level 6, you can unlock his ultimate ability: Demacian Justice.  This powerful attack instantly deals a large amount of damage to a single enemy champion.  It is very effective for finishing an opponent who is low on health.

When Ryze reaches level 6, you can unlock his ultimate ability: Desperate Power.  When activated, this spell increases Ryze's Move Speed and temporarily causes his other spells to deal area damage and steal health from enemies.
game_intro_tip_text_damage_redzone: Bots cast damaging abilities in red zones
game_intro_tip_text_readability: Explore tooltips by hovering over icons
game_objecttooltips_[champion]_enemytool: <titleLeft>Champion</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Enemy Champion</subtitleLeft><mainText>They will try and kill your Champion if given the opportunity, but killing them will yield experience and Gold. When you attack enemy Champions they will call for help causing their minions and turrets to attack you immediately.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[champion]_friendlyt: <titleLeft>Champion</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Ally Champion</subtitleLeft><mainText>Aid them in battle and stick together to defeat your enemy.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[hq]_enemytooltip: <titleLeft>The Nexus</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Enemy Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>This is the center of your enemy's power and your team's primary objective. Destroy this structure to defeat your enemy and win the game.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[hq]_friendlytooltip: <titleLeft>The Nexus</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Ally Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>This is the center of your team's power and your enemy's primary objective. Protect this structure at all costs. If your team's Nexus is destroyed your team will lose the game.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[inhibitor]_enemydis: <titleLeft>Damaged Inhibitor</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Enemy Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>This Inhibitor has been damaged allowing the Nexus crystal's power to energize your minions. It will be restored in short time and their power will be lost.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[inhibitor]_enemytoo: <titleLeft>Inhibitor</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Enemy Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>As long as your enemy's Inhibitor contains the Nexus crystal's power your minions will remain weakened.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[inhibitor]_friendly: <titleLeft>Damaged Inhibitor</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Ally Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>This Inhibitor has been damaged allowing the Nexus crystal's power to energize your enemy's minions. It will be restored in short time and their power will be lost.</mainText>
<titleLeft>Inhibitor</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Ally Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>As long as your Inhibitor contains the Nexus crystal's power your enemy's minions will remain weakened.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[minion]_enemytoolti: <mainText>This is an enemy Minion! Kill it for gold and exp!</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[minion]_friendlytoo: <mainText>This is a friendly Minion! Follow it into battle!</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[minion]_neutraltool: <mainText>This is an aggressive Monster! Kill it for its Treasure!</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[shop]_friendlytoolt: <titleLeft>Champion Item Shop</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Ally Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>Click to open the Champion Item Shop and purchase items to enhance your Champion's stats and Abilities.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[spawnpool]_friendly: <titleLeft>Summoning Platform</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Ally Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>This is where Champions begin each game session and where they will spawn after death. Standing here will refill your Champion's energies while protecting it from enemy attack.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[turret]_enemytoolti: <titleLeft>Turret</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Enemy Turret</subtitleLeft><mainText>Protecting the path to your enemy's base, turrets will always attack those who attack their allied Champions.</mainText>
game_objecttooltips_[turret]_friendlytoo: <titleLeft>Turret</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>Ally Structure</subtitleLeft><mainText>Protecting the path to your team's base, turrets will always attack enemies who attack your Champion.</mainText>
game_tutorial_auxiliary_camera_movement:
* You can unlock the camera by pressing the Y key or by clicking the Lock button in the bottom right of your screen.
* When the camera is unlocked, you can pan by moving your mouse to the edge of the screen.
* Pressing the space bar will center the camera on your champion.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_champion_battle: Enemy champions will also have a diverse set of abilities that they can use in combat in a variety of situations; it is best to team up with your allies before taking on other champions.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_champion_setup: Minions attack the first thing they see! Staying behind your minions ensures that other minions engage them first.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_hq_push: By destroying the Nexus, you sever the control that the opposing summoners have over their champions, allowing you to claim victory.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_inhibitor_push:
* Destroying an inhibitor will cause allied super minions to begin spawning.
* Super minions have greatly increased health and attack power, making them a difficult opponent for enemy champions and minions.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_level_up:
* Each time your champion gains a level, you'll gain an ability point to spend.
* The order in which you increase your champion's abilities will greatly affect how they function in battle.
* Your abilities are mapped to the Q, W, E, and R keys.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_minion_attack: Your mini-map contains valuable information about both the location of your allies and the location of your enemies.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_minion_fight:
* Your champion will automatically continue to attack the target you have selected until the target is dead.
* Minions who are attacking you will be highlighted with an orange border.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_recall:
* Recall will be interrupted by any movement or attack, as well as any damage from the enemy.
* Find a safe place away from the action to use your Recall ability.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_shop_intro:
* You earn gold by getting the killing blow on any enemy minion.
* You also earn gold by killing other enemy players or assisting your teammates in doing the same.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_shop_thornmail:
* Items don't need to be equipped and will increase your champion's statistics automatically once purchased.
* Recommended items are handpicked for each champion and will be good additions to your champion's arsenal.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_summoner_heal:
* Summoner spells assist your champion in battle and are mapped to the D and F keys.
* The Heal summoner spell restores health to your champion and a reduced amount to nearby allies.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_turret_push: Beware of attacking an enemy champion near a turret, as it will quickly switch to target you.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_volley:
* When targeting most abilities, Left-Click will choose your target and Right-Click will cancel the ability.
* Make sure to read an ability's tooltip to gain the best understanding of how it is used in battle.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_waypointi: You can also move by holding down Right-Click and moving your cursor where you want to go.
game_tutorial_auxiliary_waypointii:
* The Fog of War is also revealed when any member of your team travels into uncharted territory.
* Be careful when moving into the Fog of War, as it leaves you open to ambush.
game_tutorial_keyboard_text: All champions use the same hotkeys. Put your hand like this to easily use your abilities!
game_tutorial_obj2_line1: OBJECTIVE 2: Complete the game play tutorial
game_tutorial_objective_camera_movement: Press the Y key to unlock the camera. Then, pan to the battle by moving your mouse to the edge of the screen.
game_tutorial_objective_hq_push: Destroy the enemy's nexus to complete the tutorial!
game_tutorial_objective_level_up: Learn Ashe's volley skill by clicking the level up button at the bottom of the screen.
game_tutorial_objective_minion_attack: Move into your lane and repel the attack!
game_tutorial_objective_minion_fight: Slay the enemy minions by right clicking on them in turn.
game_tutorial_objective_recall: Press the B key to Recall your champion to the summoner platform.
game_tutorial_objective_shop_intro: Open the shop interface by clicking on the shopkeeper or the highlighted shop button.
game_tutorial_objective_shop_thornmail: Purchase Thornmail by double-clicking on the item in the recommended item list.
game_tutorial_objective_summoner_heal: Press the D key to activate the Heal summoner spell.
game_tutorial_objective_turret_push: Destroy the enemy's tower.  Make sure to follow your minions so they take the brunt of the damage!
game_tutorial_objective_volley: Press W and then left click to activate Ashe's volley. Use it to slay all four enemy minions.
game_tutorial_objective_waypointi: Move Ashe to the waypoint near the summoner platform.
game_tutorial_objective_waypointii: Move Ashe to the northern waypoint.
learning_quests_firstitem: Buy a starting item at the Shop
learning_quests_firstitem_1key: Buy a starting item at the Shop @k1@
learning_quests_firstitem_2key: Buy a starting item at the Shop @k1@
learning_quests_firstitem_tooltip: <mainText>Items make your champion stronger by improving their stats. You can only buy items by the shop on the starting platform.</mainText>
learning_quests_firstskill_1_tooltip: <mainText>Abilities give your champion special powers unique to them, choose your first ability</mainText>
learning_quests_firstskill_2_tooltip: <mainText>Abilities give your champion special powers unique to them, choose your first ability</mainText>
learning_quests_firstskill_3_tooltip: <mainText>Abilities give your champion special powers unique to them, choose your first ability</mainText>
learning_quests_firstskill_4_tooltip: <mainText>Abilities give your champion special powers unique to them, choose your first ability</mainText>
learning_quests_firstskill__tooltip: <mainText>Abilities give your champion special powers unique to them, choose your first ability</mainText>
learning_quests_lockcamera_tooltip: <mainText>Locked camera allows you to focus on the immediate battle! </mainText>
learning_quests_summonerspell_heal_1_too:
You are injured!
Use Summoner Heal to recover some health
learning_quests_summonerspell_heal_2_too:
You are injured!
Use Summoner Heal to recover some health
learning_quests_unlockcamera_tooltip: <mainText>Unlocked camera allows you to pan around and view more of a battle. </mainText>
newplayerquest_buyanitem: Buy more items at the Shop to gain more power
newplayerquest_buyanitem_1key: Buy more items at the Shop to gain more power @k1@
newplayerquest_buyanitem_2key: Buy more items at the Shop to gain more power @k1@
newplayerquest_buyanitem_tooltip:
You have a lot of gold
Buying items with your gold will make your champion stronger by improving their stats. You can only buy items on the starting platform
newplayerquest_levelupaskill_multiple_to:
You have extra skill points to spend
Leveling up your abilities makes them stronger
newplayerquest_levelupaskill_tooltip:
You have an extra skill point to spend
Leveling up your abilities makes them stronger
newplayerquest_levelupaskill_ultimate_to: <mainText>Your ultimate is your strongest ability, you almost always want to level it up when it is available</mainText>
newplayerquest_useahealthpotion_tooltip:
You're low on health
You have a health potion which can heal some of the damage you've taken
newplayerquest_useanability: Kill a minion with an ability
newplayerquest_useanability_tooltip: <mainText>Killing minions grant you extra gold which can let you purchase stronger items</mainText>
newplayerquest_youshouldrecall: Retreat and Recall to heal at base
newplayerquest_youshouldrecall_tooltip:
You're severely hurt
Recalling will heal you and give you a chance to buy items. Your recall can be interrupted by the enemy, so make sure you're somewhere safe when you recall
protips_damage_minion_02: Move Back: Minions are attacking you!
protips_damage_redzone_02: Bots cast abilities in Red Zones
protips_damage_redzone_03: Danger: Move Out of Red Zones
tutorial_arurf_2_description: Launch yourself across the map with the new catapult at your base!
tutorial_arurf_3_description: Now Elder Dragon gives you every dragon buff and Baron gives you Rift Herald!
tutorial_arurf_4_description: We made balance changes to make the 10 most powerful champions a bit weaker and the 10 worst champions a bit stronger.
tutorial_arurf_5_description: Now you get gold whenever minions die near you, so you're earning gold even if you don't get the last hit.
tutorial_arurf_6_description: Join the club to earn a random temporary skin boost, an extra reroll per game, and crazy finisher effects!
tutorial_gamemodex_card_1_description: Fights constantly break out on a compact map with special events and rewards adding a touch of chaos.
tutorial_gamemodex_card_2_description: Roam as two junglers to share gold, XP, and buffs when clearing camps together.
tutorial_gamemodex_card_3_description: Kill and assist hotstreaks set you on fire, making you much strongerâ€”but also easier to kill.
